name: Silence in the Sewers
description: A wealthy merchant wants the mysterious noises beneath his estate dealt with. Preferably quietly.

name: Desert Courier
description: A sealed letter must reach the next city across 80 km of sun-bleached dunes. Bandits are optional. Time is not.

name: Haunted Hamlet
description: Something's spooking a whole village. Exorcism or arson—your call.

name: Tower of Trouble
description: A deranged wizard has barricaded himself atop a spire. The client wants him dead—or at least shut up.

name: Escort the Idiot
description: Noble heir needs to reach the border. He's loud, arrogant, and allergic to horses. Good luck.

name: Mine Collapse
description: A support beam cracked in the iron mine. Rescue trapped workers before the rest comes down.

name: Swamp Thing
description: A creature has taken residence in the local bog. It’s hungry. The villagers aren’t thrilled.

name: Prison Break-In
description: A corrupt judge wants a specific prisoner retrieved. Don't ask why. In and out. Quietly.

name: The Stolen Goat
description: A farmer swears his prize goat was kidnapped by cultists. Return it, or at least bring closure.

name: Shipyard Sabotage
description: A rival guild needs someone to make sure a ship never sets sail. Subtlety preferred, fire optional.
